description: Archive flow fixes and UX improvements

changes.description: Archiving a participant no longer fails with a database integrity error. The archive action now correctly stores a snapshot in the archive table without attempting to delete the original record, which was blocked by a research-data-integrity trigger.

The Archived Responses table now shows the participant's Prolific ID as the primary identifier instead of raw table names and UUIDs. Clicking a row navigates directly to the response details page, and search now filters by Prolific ID.
Researchers are now prompted to enter an optional reason when archiving a participant. The reason is stored with the archive record and visible in the Archived Responses table.
